amendment.description: Amendment provides $5 million in funding for the Youth ChalleNGe program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce and then increase Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by 5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. McKinley.
